summary.para: Contains hardware input details that can be used to predict touch targets and help compensate for hardware latency when processing touch and gesture input that contains distance and velocity data.

remarks.para: By default, touch prediction is activated. For information on getting pointer data without deactivating touch prediction, see .

summary.para: The size of this structure, in bytes.
Sample time in milliseconds (used to calculate velocity).
Use timestamps provided by the hardware.
